about_the_game:
Stop, Pawssport Check is a fun couch co-op simulation game. Bring your friends and take your place at the border crossings to maintain order and security. Be on the lookout for false documents, suspicious passengers or even smuggling, you can't let anything slip through.. or can you?

BE READY FOR: MULTITASKING!

There’s few things more stressful than being late to your flight or being trapped at the border, so don't be surprised when more than one traveller is in a rush. Prepare yourself to the idea of multitasking and delegating, because these travellers will want to go, whatever it takes.

next stop: the World

While you advance through the game and gain enough points, you’ll get promoted to faraway lands filled with new ambients and challenges. From jungles with falling fruit to sand storms that leave you upside down, you are going to want to explore every location!

meet New People!

With every new location, new passengers native to the area will travel through customs. Help them pass through security, and as you clear the stage more than a few will join as agents and become unlockable characters to choose from!
